name: 2018/11/07 Lunch Garlic Sesame Asparagus
description: Indulge in a delightful, healthy side dish with our Garlic Sesame Asparagus recipe. This low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar recipe is perfect for those looking to enjoy a nutritious meal without compromising on flavor. Perfect for a health-conscious lifestyle, this recipe brings a fresh twist to your table.
recipeIngredient: 1  tbsp(s) Seeds, sesame seeds, whole, dried

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the asparagus by washing it thoroughly under cold water. Trim the ends of the asparagus spears.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, toss the asparagus with 1 tbsp of Extra Virgin Olive Oil, ensuring the spears are evenly coated.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a grill pan or skillet over medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Place the asparagus in the pan and cook for 7 minutes, turning occasionally to ensure even cooking.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: While the asparagus is cooking, toast the sesame seeds in a dry pan over low heat until they're golden brown, which should take about 3 minutes. Remove from heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Once the asparagus is tender and charred to your liking, add the minced garlic and toasted sesame seeds, tossing everything together in the pan for another 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
